title.value: American Dental Association Systematized Nomenclature of Dentistry (SNODENT)

name.value: American Dental Association; 211 East Chicago Avenue Chicago, IL 60610-2678

description.value:
Systematized Nomenclature of Dentistry (SNODENT) is owned, maintained and distributed by the American Dental Association (ADA). SNODENT is a vocabulary designed for use in the electronic environment - for electronic health and dental records. The intended purpose is to:
* Provide standardized terms for describing dental disease * Capture clinical detail and patient characteristics * Permit analysis of patient care services and outcomes * To be interoperable with Electronic Health Records (EHR) and Electronic Dental Records (EDR)
SNODENT licensing information can be found at: [http://www.ada.org/8466.aspx](http://www.ada.org/8466.aspx)
URL for Official Source: [http://www.ada.org/snodent.aspx](http://www.ada.org/snodent.aspx)

copyright.value: SNODENT is owned and maintained by the ADA. A (free of charge) license to use SNODENT content may be obtained from ADA at https://www.ada.org/resources/practice/dental-standards/snodent/snodent-license-application

comment.value: This is the URL endorsed by the TSMG and is considered authoritative.
